revised_title: The Relationships of Nerve-cells of the Cortex to the Lymphatic System of the Brain
tldr: The author investigates the relationships between nerve-cells of the cortex and the lymphatic system in the brain, focusing on the pericellular spaces and their significance in pathological research. The study examines the arrangement of nuclei around nerve-cells and their connection to the lymphatic and vascular systems, providing insights into the understanding of brain pathology and neuroglia.
